All Classes

Class Description
Board
Board class is used to store and get information about the hexed board from a game.
BoardTest
Tests for the board
BoardUpdater
Class responsible for working in the background of the client and updating the board when the data changes.
ButtonCommit
Class of the commit button of client's GUI.
ButtonReset
Class of the reset button of client's GUI.
ButtonTest
Class that tests if the buttons work.
ClickTest
Class that tests if a click is executed without problems.
Client
Main class of the client.
ClientConnector
Client's class responsible for connecting to server and communication between other client's classes and server.
ConnectionTest
Class that tests connection issues.
Coordinates
Data class used to store coordinates of a field in format of two numbers
CoordinatesTest
Tests for Coordinates class
DialogFinish
Class of dialog box displayed after the end of the game.
DialogInit
Class of dialog box displayed by the host of the game, responsible for setting the game's parameters.
DialogTest
Class that tests dialog boxes.
Field
Field class; used to store and get information about a field in a board
FieldTest
Tests for Field class
Game
Game class is used to store and get information about the current game.
GameService
Class handling the game in the side of client.
GameServiceTest  
GameTest
Tests for Game class
MessageBoard
Class of the message sent from server to all clients that initialises the board and game settings.
MessageInit
Class of message sent from the host to server that includes the basic game settings chosen by the host.
MessageMove
Class of message passed from clients to server with information about the move or reset of the move.
MessagesTest
Class that tests messages.
MessageUpdate
Class of message sent from server to all clients that updates the clients' copies of fields array.
MouseHandler
Class responsible for handling the mouse's clicks.
Panel
Class of tne client's panel.
Player
Class used to store and get information about players in the game
PlayerTest
Player test
Possibilities  
PossibilitiesDecorator
Abstract decorator class consisting of methods used to calculate the additive fields to which a player can move.
PossibilitiesJump
Concrete decorator class consisting of methods used to calculate the fields to which a player can move by jumping over another pieces.
PossibilitiesSimple
Class consisting of methods used to calculate the fields to which a player can move (only around the chosen field).
PossibilitiesTest
Tests for possibilities class
Server  
ThreadHost
ThreadHost is an variant of ThreadPlayer with implemented communication necessary for initialising the game.
ThreadPlayer
Thread class; each tread is assigned to one player and one client; Responsible for handling the communication, receiving and sending messages to and from a client.
Window
Class of the client's window.
WindowTest
Class that tests the window class.
